distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for xerces-c fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-37536: Fixed an integer overflow that could have led to a out-of-bounds memory accesses (bsc#1216156).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: An integer overflow in xerces-c++ 3.2.3 in BigFix Platform allows remote attackers to cause out-of-bound access via HTTP request.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
